::KitKat::

She finished the programming and unhooked the wires.  She put on the 
head set and talked through the mouth peice.  "I am Megatron, Ruller 
of the Predacons."  The clone repeated her statement. She grinned.  
Then she pressed another button on the side of the head piece, that 
switched the voice control over to taking orders. "Megatron, raise 
your head and roar."  The clone did as it was told.  She was very 
impressed with herself. She ordered the clone to stay in the lab and 
stay in a restinf possition untill needed.  She walked out of the 
lab, still with the headset on and walked to the bridge.  She opened 
up her link to Destructor. "General Destructor, please report your 
situation. Famine is here and getting the supplies you have 
requested."
